skills.name: Splitting Spearhead
desc: After Dan Heng uses his Technique, his ATK increases by 40% at the start of the next battle for 3 turn(s).

eidolons.name: The Higher You Fly, the Harder You Fall
eidolons.desc: When the target enemy's current HP percentage is greater than or equal to 50%, CRIT Rate increases by 12%.

eidolons.name: Quell the Venom Octet, Quench the Vice O'Flame
Seen and Unseen
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Roaring Dragon and Soaring Sun
eidolons.desc: When Dan Heng uses his Ultimate to defeat an enemy, his next action is Advanced Forward by 100%.

eidolons.name: A Drop of Rain Feeds a Torrent
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: The Troubled Soul Lies in Wait
eidolons.desc: The Slow state triggered by Skill reduces the enemy's SPD by an extra 8%.

skillTree.name: Hidden Dragon
skillTree.desc: When current HP percentage is 50% or lower, reduces the chance of being attacked by enemies.

skillTree.name: Faster Than Light
skillTree.desc: After launching an attack, there is a 50% fixed chance to increase own SPD by 20% for 2 turn(s).

skillTree.name: High Gale
skillTree.desc: Basic ATK deals 40% more DMG to Slowed enemies.
